==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* Teoiztac comes from ''Ilhuicatl-Teoiztac'' ({{w|Nahuatl}}: “the sky where the white god (is)”; Ilhuicatl “sky”; teotl “god”; iztac “white”), which was the ninth celestial stratum of the {{w|Thirteen Heavens}} of the {{w|Aztec Mythology}}. It is where the white god Quetzalcoatl and the Tzitzimimeh live.
